name: Postmen
description:
This is a micro project done in a private JAM contest with the following subject: "You are a postman, Harry" (induced: Harry Potter).

This game has been done in about 6 hours.

The graphics are unfortunately in a very low quality (sorry for that !), because I'm a simple developer :)

The downloadable video shows the development timelapse (6h in less than 9 minutes) if you are curious !
